title: Is Daenerys religious? - Quora
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire Characters
A Song of Ice and Fire (book series)

response.answer_text: I think she is more of a dreamer rather than religious. She believes in herself, and that her dreams will become reality one way or another. She hints through statements that she has some kind of “feeling/premonition” that her life will never be ordinary, I always imagined it kind of like the way heroines in fairytales believe in their true love or magic, they just “know.” Kahl Drogo/The Dothraki have a religion, and she respects them and participates in their rituals, so she could POSSIBLY be religious. But i think it was hinted in the book that she found their beliefs too foreign to believe in it.
